argument.name: nativeFormat
argument.description: Use native format. Set to .t. for most reliable results round trip.

page.example:
dim pngdata as b = file.to_blob("e:\dev\category.bmp") ? pngdata.size() = 10746
dim zipped as b = *gzip_blob(pngdata,.t.) ? zipped.size() = 4891
dim unzipped as b = *gunzip_blob(zipped,.t.) ? unzipped.size() = 10746
? pngdata = unzipped = .T.
